questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates explore an island shaped like a drum and encounter a reindeer doctor. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face a challenge against a Warlord of the Sea known for his ability to turn people into toys. What is...?
This arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates' involvement in a rebellion against a tyrant king on an island in the sky. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, involves using the cold of the underworld to freeze opponents. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, allows him to extract and manipulate the souls of others. What is...?
This Devil Fruit power allows its user to manipulate and create biscuits at will. What is...?
This character, often seen with a pinwheel hat, is the adoptive older brother of a Straw Hat crew member and was once a member of the Sun Pirates. Who is...?
This captain of the Red Hair Pirates is known for his laid-back demeanor and being one of the Four Emperors. Who is...?
This character is a former fleet admiral of the Marines, known for his ice powers and strict sense of justice. Who is...?
